content: The Helios FHIR Accelerator for Public Health is happy to announce that we are soliciting community ideas and feedback on the use cases Helios should focus on in 2022. Please visit Helios’ 2022 Use Cases page (https://confluence.hl7.org/display/PH/2022+Use+Cases) for more details on how you can help shape the future of the Helios Accelerator. As always, if you have any questions, please reach out to us at helios@hl7.org. Thank you and we look forward to hearing your thoughts and ideas.

Just a reminder that the Helios Accelerator is soliciting community input on use cases for 2022 and beyond. Please visit the Helios’ 2022 Use Cases page for more details on how you can help shape the future of the Helios Accelerator. While the initial push for feedback closes February 13, 2022, feedback will be accepted and incorporated on a rolling basis. As always, if you have any questions, please reach out to us at helios@hl7.org. Thank you and we look forward to hearing your thoughts and ideas.
Here is a link to the Helios 2022 Use Case Page: https://confluence.hl7.org/display/PH/2022+Use+Cases
